channel.title: Recommended Music — Nico Less
channel.description: Recommendations for slow and melancholic music, between Ambient and Experimental.

item.title: loscil — Lake Fire
item.description: The latest album by loscil, Lake Fire, was released on May 2, 2025, and I finally took the time to listen to it. For a good reason. Because who could be more fitting for the very first post on this blog?

item.title: Sadie Powers — Souvenir
item.description: Sadie Powers combines vivid soundscapes with her main instrument, the bass, creating a mood that draws the listener deep into thought. The sad personal story behind the album (as described on her Bandcamp page) becomes audible.
